channel.title: Genesis ECO PvP 718 [VPS 24/7 Uptime] || All Skills || Bosses || SoF || XP Rates
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lHYV02a.png[/img]
We listen to the player suggestions! We are just like RuneScape before the EoC crap, but with extremely stable XP rates and you will enjoy your stay! All skills are working and we have the oldschool Edgeville home to bring back memoires! Teleports in the 'Tasks' and Bossing is truly an amazing experience!
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][B] Play Now: [/B] [url=http://genesispvp.org/index.html]Genesis Webclient[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][B] Website: [/B] [url=http://genesispvp.org/]Home Page[/url] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][B] Download: [/B] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/yu2doyw0o2n5z6e/Genesis718.jar]Genesis Client[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BKD1mEF.png[/img]
[u][b]Features[/b][/u]
Farming Slayer Hunter QBD Nomad Godwars Nex Bork Achievements Castle Wars Clan Wars Barrows Fight Kiln Fight Pits Fight Caves Dominion Tower Duel Arena Staking Pets Strykewyrms AutoDonation Hiscores Squeal of Fortune Bank Tabs Slayer Points And More!
[B]Owners[/B]
- Haashim - 0x01
[B]Head of Staff[/B]
- Xzythe
[B]Administrators[/B]
- Jesse - OPEN
[B]Moderators[/B]
- OPEN - OPEN - OPEN
